articles.title: Solar 'tsunami' sparks radio blackout before storm makes direct Earth hit –radiation fears - Express
articles.description: AN explosion from a sunspot has blasted a solar flare towards the Earth, sparking radio blackouts and sending fears of radiation soaring for high risk airline passengers ahead of a predicted solar storm hit on March 31.
